import React,{useState} from 'react' import '../css/login.css' import axios from 'axios' import {Link,useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' export default function LogIn(props) { const [phone,setPhone] = useState(''); const [UserName,setUserName] = useState(''); const [Error,setError] = useState('') const history=useHistory(); /*get user information and token from DB*/ async function handleSubmit(e) { setError('') e.preventDefault() let obj = {name: UserName,phone: phone} let response = await axios.post("https://messagesapp1.herokuapp.com/api/logIn",obj) if(response.data !== "not found") { sessionStorage['config']= response.data.token sessionStorage['id'] = response.data.User._id sessionStorage['name'] = response.data.User.name props.CanLogIn(response.data.User._id) history.push('/App') } else setError("One or more of your identification details is incorrect.") } return (

Log In
